snippet: A Citibank branch in Upper Manhattan burned for more than a day, leaving the fate of the bank’s 300 safe deposit boxes unknown.
abstract: Six-alarm fire that destroyed a Citibank branch in Upper Manhattan left fate of the bank’s 300 safe deposit boxes unknown; scores of customers have arrived at branch looking for information about their belongings, but Buildings Dept will no authorize access to the basement where the safe deposit boxes are located until a structural stability report has been issued.
lead_paragraph: A Citibank branch in Upper Manhattan burned for more than a day, leaving the fate of the bank’s 300 safe deposit boxes unknown.

headline.main: With Fate of Safe Deposit Boxes Unknown, Bank Customers Fret After Blaze
headline.print_headline: With Fate of Safe Deposit Boxes Unknown, Bank Customers Fret After Blaze
